stimulusHtml: Using correct units, explain the meaning of  ∫ 20 40 v ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44BB@ in the context of this problem. Use a trapezoidal sum with the three subintervals indicated by the data in the table to approximate  ∫ 20 40 v ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44BB@ .

features.html: The velocity of a particle moving along the x-axis is modeled by a differentiable function v, where the position x is measured in meters, and time t is measured in seconds. Selected values of v(t) are given in the table above. The particle is at position x=7 meters when t=0 seconds.
